summary: Cathay Pacific is Hong Kong's main airline, flying to over 190 destinations worldwide. It was founded in 1946 by Sydney de Kantzow and Roy Farrell. The airline uses different types of planes, like Airbus and Boeing, and its cargo services use Boeing 747s. In the past, they had a subsidiary called Cathay Dragon, which flew to many places in Asia. Cathay Pacific is known for its high-quality service and has won awards, including being named the world's best airline four times. It is also a member of the Oneworld airline alliance.
title: Cathay Pacific
